snippet: When the original Palm, a Manhattan steakhouse, closed, Herbert E. Nass, a lawyer whose face was caricatured on the wall, made sure his likeness would live on.
abstract: Palm restaurant regular Herbert E Nass, whose face graced wall of celebrity portraits at Second Avenue location in Manhattan, is immortalized at 50th Street location after original portrait is painted over in midst of renovations.
lead_paragraph: When the original Palm, a Manhattan steakhouse, closed, Herbert E. Nass, a lawyer whose face was caricatured on the wall, made sure his likeness would live on.

headline.main: An Old Face on the Palm Steakhouse’s Wall Relocates, With His Family Included
headline.print_headline: A Face on the Restaurant Wall Relocates With His Relatives
